definition: having qualities of beauty : exciting aesthetic pleasure
generally pleasing : excellent
very attractive in a physical way
giving pleasure to the mind or the senses
very good or pleasing : not having any bad qualities

having qualities of beauty : giving pleasure to the mind or senses                                      
             
             a beautiful child

very good : excellent                                      
             
             beautiful weather
in: beautiful mountain scenery
a lovely melody
a handsome Georgian mansion
a painter of conventionally pretty scenes
the comely grace of a dancer
fair of face
You have the most beautiful smile.
The film tells a beautiful story about two young lovers.
Our hotel room had a beautiful view of the ocean.
The sunsets here are absolutely beautiful.
What a beautiful day for a picnic!
This is a beautiful example of early American poetry.
a beautiful child
a beautiful song
beautiful weather
We saw a beautiful sunset.
It was a beautiful story about faith.
She held a pretty little doll.
The mayor sat at a handsome desk.

definition: a beautiful person is extremely attractive
something that is beautiful is very pleasant to look at
very pleasant
done or made very well or with a lot of skill
Adverbs
beautiful
: achingly, breathtakingly, exquisitely, hauntingly, outstandingly, ravishingly, spectacularly, staggeringly, strikingly, stunningly
: ruggedly, scenically, starkly, strangely
in: Their mother was a very beautiful woman.
my five beautiful kids

He produces starkly beautiful monochromatic sculptures.

definition: the person reading this

Marginalized Orientations, Gender identities, And Intersex. it’s meant to be an all inclusive umbrella term for asexuals, homosexuals, multisexuals, trans people, and intersex people. Alternative to LGBTQIAP+
Alternative to MOGII, easier to pronounce.
YOU.

People believe that being beautiful is the same as hot, pretty or even sexy. It's not. True beauty is personality or something so pure - like the shine in his eyes when he talks about something he loves, or the way he dances when he's excited, or even something as simple as the look exchanged by two people who feel the same way. Beauty is all around you: it's the purest thing you'll ever see, like a californian sunset or a british countryside.beauty is a difficult thing to explain because there is no one definition. beauty is everywhere and everything. If you look deep inside a person,you will see that they are beautiful-maybe not on the outside but on the inside.Being beautiful is not about the physical features, it's about being you. If you are being true to yourself then you're beautiful. <3
it's not hot or fine...it's more than pretty...you dont have to try to "be" it..people just know you are..its what's on the inside
A person that's kind and caring, someone with good looks, a nice personality, and someone that isn't like the others. When everyone is going right, they're the only person that's going left.
Someone whose personality and physical appearance is considered extremely attractive to someone else
